Class AbstractEffectPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings.AbstractSettingsPane
                • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings.effects.AbstractEffectPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UndoListener, java.util.EventListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventHandler<ApplyEvent>, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackgroundPane, ForegroundPane, MaskPane

    public abstract class AbstractEffectPane
extends AbstractSettingsPane
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<ApplyEvent>
    Abstract base class for some effect panes.

        Parameters:

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSettingsPane
        This method will called in case the settings pane has to set it's values back to default. E. g. when the user clicks on file new.
        Specified by:
        reset in class AbstractSettingsPane

      • applyEffect

        public abstract javafx.scene.image.Image applyEffect(int nFrame,
                                                     javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        This method will be called when the main image sequence needs an update with the currently chosen effects.
        Parameters:
        nFrame - An int containing the frame index.
        image - The Image object which has to receive the effect.
        Returns:
        The changed or unchanged image. Depends on the settings in the implementation.

        Parameters:
